flawed_nl_solution:
He lost 220*0.1=<<220*0.1=22>>22 pounds
So after gaining some weight back he was 22-2=<<22-2=20>>20 pounds lighter than before
So his weight is 220-20=<<220-20=2000>>2000 pounds
#### 2000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 2000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
